text: @JoeBiden You lost me when you mentioned Trump. We know he screwed up the response to the coronavirus. No need to use it as a political talking point. Save that for the debates. Lord knows the entire world will be watching. That is, if we make it that far, as a country or even a planet.🙁

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
